howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three easy steps to generate subtitles for your videos

items.title: Upload Video
items.description: Upload your video by dragging and dropping or browsing files. Supported formats include MP4, AVI, and MOV.

items.title: AI Processing
items.description: Our advanced AI analyses your audio and automatically generates accurate subtitles in real-time.

items.title: Download Subtitles
items.description: Preview the subtitles and download them in various formats or embed them directly into your video.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common queries about the Auto Subtitle Generator

items.title: What languages does WaveSpeed support for subtitles?
items.description: We support a wide range of languages for subtitle generation including English, Spanish, French, and more. You can select the desired language during the upload process.

items.title: Is there a limit to video length for subtitle generation?
items.description: Yes, each video can be up to 2 hours long for subtitle processing. Longer videos can be handled by splitting them into segments.

items.title: Can I edit the generated subtitles?
items.description: Absolutely! After generation, you can review and easily edit any subtitles before finalizing your download.

items.title: How does the privacy protection work?
items.description: WaveSpeed processes all videos directly in your browser using advanced security measures. Your files are never uploaded to our servers, ensuring complete privacy and data protection.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Videos?
